required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Y-TZP and In-mouth Low Thermal Degradation A Prospective Clinical Study
clinical_study.official_title: Y-TZP and In-mouth Low Thermal Degradation: A Prospective Clinical Study

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this work is to study in-mouth aging and LTD of monolithic zirconia restorations. Microstructural changes characteristic of LTD processes, wear, and clinical behaviour following standard parameters will be evaluated. Notably Raman spectroscopy and 3D laser surface analysis will be used, directly on the restorations, which will be removed at regular intervals.The working hypothesis is that LTD process is very slow at the scale at the lifespan of dental prostheses.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Zirconia monolithic restorations in-vivo and in-vitro evaluation

clinical_study.condition: Zirconia Monolithic Dental Crowns and Bridges In-vivo Behaviour and Ageing.

arm_group.description: evaluation of Lava Plus zirconia dental crowns and bridges

intervention.description: Zirconia monolithic dental crowns and bridges evaluation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Full zirconia crowns in the posterior region (molar/premolar)
- On teeth or implants
- Single unit restorations cemented on natural teeth and implants (including screw-retained restorations if possible, but no internal connections)
- Multi-unit restorations on implants
- If nightguard: to be performed on the antagonist
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with removable prosthesis as an antagonist

facility.name: Institute of Dentistry University of Liege
